# Cyborg / AI
- As a silicon, your laws are your in game rules. - The order of your laws is their priority, lower laws are more important than higher ones. - If undefined, crew is anyone who has an ID icon above them in your HUD. - If orders conflict, you may decide how to resolve the conflict. - Harm is defined as physical harm. - You only have to prevent your laws from being changed if stated in your laws. - You can rules-lawer to an extent, if someone misspells a name it is their fault. - You can ignore extremely unreasonable orders, for example: "Do nothing but collect every piece of trash on the station" - Act like a robot.
